Communications, Inc. | licensee = L.M. Communications of Kentucky, LLC | sister_stations = [[WJYP]], [[WKLC-FM]], [[WMXE]], [[WSCW]] | webcast = | website = | affiliations = }} '''WMON''' is a [[Southern Gospel]]-formatted [[Broadcasting|broadcast]] [[radio station]] licensed to [[Montgomery, West Virginia]], USA, serving Eastern [[Kanawha County, West Virginia]] and Western [[Fayette County, West Virginia]]. WMON is owned and operated by L.M. Communications, Inc. ==External links== *{{AM station data|WMON}} {{Charleston WV Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in West Virginia|MON]] [[Category:Southern Gospel radio stations in the United States]] {{WestVirginia-radio-station-stub}}
